1.text: Click at the vertex of the curve.

2.text: Click at the either end of the acetabular cup diameter.
2.supp: These two points will form the long axis of the ellipse tracing the acetabular cup perimeter.

3.text: Click on any point along the acetabular component superior perimeter that is visible to you.
3.supp: This point allows us to complete the ellipse around the acetabular cup head.

4.text: Click on any point along the acetabular component inferior ellipse perimeter that is visible to you.
4.supp: This point allows us to complete the ellipse around the acetabular cup perimeter.

5.supp: Download the current image's measurements, or  measurements of all annotated images, as a text or CSV file. To annotate another image, simply upload a new image.
